column3: Mashed Potatoes" - get rid of the Beef
column4: (or the way they spell it) if the signature dry aged rib eye is SUBpar as we DIDN'T enjoy last night.  The drinks
column6: sides and service were top notch but steak was tough and dry.  SO disappointed.  With about a gazillion Chicago Steak Houses (within just a few blocks) hope this "name change" suggestion allows them to stay open.
